I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type] ?C : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type]

VectorDef.const : ?A -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 where ?A : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type]

pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.L : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (?m + n0) where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]

Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.L_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.L n0 p)) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.R_sanity : forall (n0 : nat) (p : pos ?m), proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat (Fin.R n0 p)) = n0 + proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) where ?m : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
Fin.caseS' : forall (p : pos (S ?n)) (P : pos (S ?n) -> Type), P pos0 -> (forall p0 : pos ?n, P (pos_nxt p0)) -> P p where ?n : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (a ## v1) (b ## v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type] ?B : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (a ## v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat ii : mm_instr (pos n) s : mm_state n |- Type]
mm_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mm_sss_ind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mm_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
mma_sss_sind : forall (n : nat) (P : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> SProp), (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), P (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x])) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v)) -> (forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n) (u : nat), v#>x = S u -> P (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x])) -> forall (m : mm_instr (pos n)) (m0 m1 : mm_state n), mma_sss m m0 m1 -> P m m0 m1
Inductive mm_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mm_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mm_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mm_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mm_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (1 + i, v[u/x]) Arguments mm_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mm_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
Inductive mma_sss (n : nat) : mm_instr (pos n) -> mm_state n -> mm_state n -> Prop := in_mma_sss_inc : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (v : vec nat n), mma_sss (INCₐ x) (i, v) (1 + i, v[(S (v#>x))/x]) | in_mma_sss_dec_0 : forall (i : nat) (x : pos n) (k : nat) (v : vec nat n), v#>x = 0 ->...-> mma_sss (DECₐ x k) (i, v) (k, v[u/x]) Arguments mma_sss [n]%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_inc [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_0 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope Arguments in_mma_sss_dec_1 [n]%nat_scope _%nat_scope _ _%nat_scope _ [u]%nat_scope
pm_lift = fun (m n : nat) (r : pos_map m n) (p : pos (S m)) => let s := pos_S_inv p in match s with | inl _ => pos0 | inr (exist _ p0 _) => pos_nxt (r p0) end : forall m n : nat, pos_map m n -> pos_map (S m) (S n) Arguments pm_lift {m n}%nat_scope _ _ /
Fin.depair = fix depair (m n : nat) (o : pos m) (p : pos n) {struct o} : pos (m * n) := match o in (pos n0) return (pos (n0 * n)) with | @Fin.F1 m' => Fin.L (m' * n) p | @Fin.FS n0 o' => Fin.R n (depair n0 n o' p) end : forall m n : nat, pos m -> pos n -> pos (m * n) Arguments Fin.depair {m n}%nat_scope
pos_O_inv = let pos_inv_t := fun n : nat => match n as x return (pos x -> Set) with | 0 => fun _ : pos 0 => False | S n0 => fun i : pos (S n0) => ((i = pos0) + {p : pos n0 | i = pos_nxt p})%type end in let pos_inv := fun (_tmp : nat) (p0 : pos _tmp) => match p0 as t in (pos n) return (pos_inv_t n t) with | @Fin.F1 n => inl eq_refl | @Fin.FS n p => inr (exist (fun p1 : pos n => pos_nxt p = pos_nxt p1) p eq_refl) end in pos_inv 0 : pos 0 -> False
pos_not_diag : forall n : nat, list (pos n * pos n)
pos_list : forall n : nat, list (pos n)
FinFun.Fin2Restrict.extend : forall n : nat, (pos n -> pos n) -> nat -> nat
Fin.of_nat_lt = fix of_nat_lt (p n : nat) {struct p} : p < n -> pos n := match n as n0 return (p < n0 -> pos n0) with | 0 => fun H : p < 0 => False_rect (pos 0) (Nat.nlt_0_r p H) | S n' => match p as p0 return (p0 < S n' -> pos (S n')) with | 0 => fun _ : 0 < S n' => pos0 | S p' => fun H : S p' < S n' => pos_nxt (of_nat_lt p' n' (lt_S_n p' n' H)) end end : forall p n : nat, p < n -> pos n Arguments Fin.of_nat_lt {p n}%nat_scope
pos_nat : forall n : nat, pos n -> {i : nat | i < n}
